response.overview: Infinite Fighting World is a hit VR game known for its advanced design and intense gameplay. Top gamers Cheng Yang and Zhou are long-time rivals who meet every year at the championship tournament. In 2016, Cheng Yang wins—but Zhou never logs in. After the match, Cheng receives a mysterious location and VR headset sent by Zhou, transporting him into an upgraded version of the game. This new world fully simulates all five senses and introduces far greater challenges, pushing players beyond anything they’ve experienced before.
response.title: 无限斗界
